detaileddescription.para: The primary job of the compiler is to take the high level jack language and translate it from, jack, vm, asm, then finally to mc.

sect1.title: SyntaxAnalyzer
sect1.para:
Provides a static library that compiles the jack code into a parse tree.
The definition for the jack grammar can be found here.
Note: the not operator ! is implemented both as '~' and '!'.

sect1.title: CompileUtils
sect1.para: Provides the code that implements the parse tree, as well as extra classes that operate on the parse tree.

sect1.title: Jack2XML
sect1.para:
Is the program that uses the parse tree and outputs inspection files.
Usage:Jack2xml<options><arg[0]..arg[n]>
-h,--helpDisplaythishelpmessage -f,--formatSpecifyanoutputfileformat -xml,formatasXML(default) -dot,formatasDOT -d,--directoryConvertsall.jackfilesinthecurrentdirectoryto.xml -o,--outputSpecifyanoutputfile -thedirectoryoptiontakesprecedence

sect1.title: CodeGenerator
sect1.para: Is the static library that implements the parse tree conversion from jack to vm.

sect1.title: Defined In
sect1.para: The source is defined in Source/Compiler
